notes: This map illustrates IDP settlements in Melut, Upper Nile State, South Sudan. Using high-resolution imagery optical satellite imagery collected by the WorldView-3 satellite on 2 December 2014, UNOSAT located 3,587 IDP structures (3,005 shelters and 582 Tukuls). The 6 distinct IDP settlements identified by UNOSAT occupy a total area of 86.09 ha. Of these, a total of 214 IDP structures are found within the Melut UNMISS Base, covering a total area of 1.84 ha. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
